remarks: Every solution of a system of linear equations represented by a matrix and a vector is a vector.  (Contributed by AV, 10-Feb-2019.)  (Revised by AV, 27-Feb-2019.)
statement:
slesolex.a $e |- A = ( N Mat R ) $.
slesolex.b $e |- B = ( Base ` A ) $.
slesolex.v $e |- V = ( ( Base ` R ) ^m N ) $.
slesolex.x $e |- .x. = ( R maVecMul <. N , N >. ) $.
slesolvec $p |- ( ( ( N =/= (/) /\ R e. Ring ) /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. V ) ) -> ( ( X .x. Z ) = Y -> Z e. V ) ) $.
